xmlquery.searchOrderDetailByIdOrderDetail: Select * from smpos_order_detail where idOrder=? and idOrderDetail=?
xmlquery.searchOrderDetailByIdOrder: Select * from smpos_order_detail where idOrder=? order by idOrderDetail limit ?,2
xmlquery.orderDetailDelete: Delete from smpos_order_detail where idOrder = ? and idOrderDetail=?
xmlquery.orderDetailEdit: Update smpos_order_detail set idOrder=?,idOrderDetail=?,idProduct=?,amount=?,unit=?,unitPrice=?, subTotal=? where idOrder=? and idOrderDetail=?
